voxeltools.config.allowItemUse.tooltip: Enables/disables the functionality of all items.
voxeltools.config.defaultPermLevel.toolt: The default permission level of the permission [voxeltools.item], which grants players access to VoxelTools.
voxeltools.config.paintbrushRange.toolti:
The range of the Magical Paintbrush when remotely painting a block.
Anything below the player's reach distance (default 5) will disable remote painting.
voxeltools.config.jackhammerNoPhys.toolt: Whether to use no-physics mode for either mouse button, both, or neither.
voxeltools.config.allowOverwrite.tooltip: Whether to allow block-moving items (ie Graviton Sledge) to destroy blocks in their way when the player is sneaking.
voxeltools.config.shovelDigRadiusX: Auto-Shoveler 9001's Dig Radius on the X axis
voxeltools.config.shovelDigRadiusX.toolt: The radius of the Auto-Shoveler 9001's dig ability on the X axis. Set to 0 to disable.
voxeltools.config.shovelDigRadiusY: Auto-Shoveler 9001's Dig Radius on the Y axis
voxeltools.config.shovelDigRadiusY.toolt: The radius of the Auto-Shoveler 9001's dig ability on the Y axis. Set to 0 to disable.
voxeltools.config.shovelDigRadiusZ: Auto-Shoveler 9001's Dig Radius on the Z axis
voxeltools.config.shovelDigRadiusZ.toolt: The radius of the Auto-Shoveler 9001's dig ability on the Z axis. Set to 0 to disable.
voxeltools.config.shovelFlattenRadius.to: The radius of the Auto-Shoveler 9001's flatten ability. Set to 0 to disable.
voxeltools.config.shovelFlattenHeight.to:
The height of the Auto-Shoveler 9001's flatten ability.
Set to 1 to only flatten blocks on the same horizontal plane.
voxeltools.config.shovelFlattenHeightOff:
The Auto-Shoveler 9001's flatten ability's height offset from the block clicked.
A value of 0 is the plane of the block clicked, and 'n' is the plane 'n' blocks above the block.
voxeltools.config.chainsawCutRadius.tool: The radius of the A.S.H. Chainsaw's cutting (trees) ability. Set to 0 to disable.
voxeltools.config.chainsawCleanRadius.to: The radius of the A.S.H. Chainsaw's cleaning (vegetation in general) ability. Set to 0 to disable.
